attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stop the kind of cruelty to animals which is being shown in "crush" videos'- 
Here is a link to still pictures of one particular crush video...be warned, it is not pleasant. This kind of brutality is going on in the UK and the people responsible need to be stopped urgently:

http://www.snopes.com/photos/gruesome/crushvideo.asp
